targets.target: match(n:GIT:DATA) where (tofloat(n.inSightsTime)>=?START_TIME? AND tofloat(n.inSightsTime)<=?END_TIME?) and  (n.repoName="agency_gateway_api")   with n as n,split(n.inSightsTimeX,'T')[0] as time return time,count(n.commitId) as count order by time

match(n:GIT:DATA) where (tofloat(n.inSightsTime)>=?START_TIME? AND tofloat(n.inSightsTime)<=?END_TIME?) and   (n.repoName="agency_gateway_api")   return count(n.commitId) as count,count(distinct n.authorName) as count1
match(n:SCM:GIT:DATA)  where n.inSightsTime>(timestamp()/1000)-1*86400   and   (n.repoName="agency_gateway_api")   return count(n.commitId) as Last24Hrs
match(n:SCM:GIT:DATA)  where n.inSightsTime>(timestamp()/1000)-7*86400  and  (n.repoName="agency_gateway_api")   return count(n.commitId) as Last7Days
match(n:SCM:GIT:DATA)  where n.inSightsTime>(timestamp()/1000)-14*86400  and   (n.repoName="agency_gateway_api")   return count(n.commitId) as Last14Days

match(m:GIT:DATA) where (tofloat(m.inSightsTime)>=?START_TIME? AND tofloat(m.inSightsTime)<=?END_TIME?) and  (m.repoName="agency_gateway_api")
with m,
CASE WHEN m.authorName="Matt Howell"
THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as MattHowell,
CASE WHEN m.authorName="Jenkins Automation Server"
THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as JenkinsAutomationServer,
CASE WHEN m.authorName="cakersrailroad"
THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as cakersrailroad,
CASE WHEN m.authorName="Matt"
THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as Matt,
CASE WHEN m.authorName="Mattie J"
THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as MattieJ,
CASE WHEN m.authorName="Chandra Pasupuleti"
THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as ChandraPasupuleti,
CASE WHEN m.authorName="James Childers"
THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as JamesChilders
return  split(m.inSightsTimeX,'T')[0] as inSightsTime,sum(MattHowell) as MattHowell,sum(JenkinsAutomationServer) as JenkinsAutomationServer,sum(cakersrailroad) as cakersrailroad,sum(Matt) as Matt,sum(MattieJ) as MattieJ,sum(ChandraPasupuleti) as ChandraPasupuleti,sum(JamesChilders) as JamesChilders  order by inSightsTime
match(n:GIT:DATA) where n.repoName="agency_gateway_api"  AND (tofloat(n.inSightsTime)>=?START_TIME? AND tofloat(n.inSightsTime)<=?END_TIME?)   return n.authorName,count(n.commitId) as count

match(m:CI:JENKINS:DATA) where exists(m.result)   and m.jobName IN ["Build_Deploy_PCF_Dev", "Build_Deploy_PCF_QA", "API_Build_Deploy_PCF_QA" ,"Build_Deploy_PCF_Stage"] AND (tofloat(m.inSightsTime)>=?START_TIME? AND tofloat(m.inSightsTime)<=?END_TIME?)
with m,
CASE WHEN m.result="SUCCESS"
THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as success,
CASE 
WHEN m.result="FAILURE" OR m.result="UNSTABLE" 
THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as failure
return split(m.inSightsTimeX,'T')[0] as inSightsTime,sum(success) as Success, sum(failure) as Failure  order by inSightsTime asc

match(m:CI:JENKINS:DATA) where exists(m.result)   and m.jobName IN ["Build_Deploy_PCF_Dev", "Build_Deploy_PCF_QA", "API_Build_Deploy_PCF_QA" ,"Build_Deploy_PCF_Stage"] AND (tofloat(m.inSightsTime)>=?START_TIME? AND tofloat(m.inSightsTime)<=?END_TIME?) 
with m,
CASE WHEN m.result="SUCCESS"
THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as success,
CASE 
WHEN m.result="FAILURE" OR m.result="UNSTABLE" 
THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as failure
return sum(success) as Success, sum(failure) as Failure

match(m:CI:JENKINS:DATA) where m.jobName IN ["Build_Deploy_PCF_Dev", "Build_Deploy_PCF_QA", "API_Build_Deploy_PCF_QA" ,"Build_Deploy_PCF_Stage"] AND (tofloat(m.inSightsTime)>=?START_TIME? AND tofloat(m.inSightsTime)<=?END_TIME?)
with m,
CASE WHEN m.jobName="Build_Deploy_PCF_Dev"
THEN m.duration ELSE 0 END as Build_Deploy_PCF_Dev,
CASE 
WHEN m.jobName="Build_Deploy_PCF_QA"
THEN m.duration ELSE 0 END as Build_Deploy_PCF_QA,
CASE 
WHEN m.jobName="API_Build_Deploy_PCF_QA"
THEN m.duration ELSE 0 END as API_Build_Deploy_PCF_QA,
CASE 
WHEN m.jobName="Build_Deploy_PCF_Stage"
THEN m.duration ELSE 0 END as Build_Deploy_PCF_Stage
return split(m.inSightsTimeX,'T')[0] as inSightsTime,ceil(avg(toInt(Build_Deploy_PCF_Dev/1000))) as Build_Deploy_PCF_Dev,ceil(avg(toInt(Build_Deploy_PCF_QA/1000))) as Build_Deploy_PCF_QA,ceil(avg(toInt(API_Build_Deploy_PCF_QA/1000))) as API_Build_Deploy_PCF_QA,ceil(avg(toInt(Build_Deploy_PCF_Stage/1000))) as Build_Deploy_PCF_Stage order by inSightsTime

match(n:CI:JENKINS:DATA)    where n.jobName IN ["Build_Deploy_PCF_Dev", "Build_Deploy_PCF_QA", "API_Build_Deploy_PCF_QA" ,"Build_Deploy_PCF_Stage"] with  n.jobName as jobName,n.result as result,n.buildNumber as buildNumber,ceil(avg(toInt(n.duration/1000/60))) as AvgDuration,split(n.inSightsTimeX,"Z")[0] as BuildTime,collect(distinct n.buildUrl) as buildURL,toInt(n.inSightsTime) as time,n.shortDescription as Description OPTIONAL match(m:CI:JENKINS:DATA)   where m.jobName=split(split(split(Description,'Started by upstream project "')[1],'"')[0],'/')[1] and m.buildNumber=split(Description,'build number ')[1]  return jobName,result,collect(distinct buildNumber) as buildNumber,AvgDuration,split(m.shortDescription,',')[0]  as BuildType,BuildTime,buildURL,Description,time order by time desc limit 5

MATCH(n:CI:JENKINS:DATA) where n.jobName in ["Build_Deploy_PCF_Dev", "Build_Deploy_PCF_QA", "API_Build_Deploy_PCF_QA" ,"Build_Deploy_PCF_Stage"] AND  tofloat(n.inSightsTime)>=?START_TIME? AND tofloat(n.inSightsTime)<=?END_TIME? return ceil(avg(toInt(n.duration/1000))) as AvgTime

panels.title: Time to Package API Build(in secs)

targets.target: match(n:CI:JENKINS:DATA)  where n.inSightsTime>(timestamp()/1000)-1*86400 AND n.jobName IN ["Build_Deploy_PCF_Dev", "Build_Deploy_PCF_QA", "API_Build_Deploy_PCF_QA" ,"Build_Deploy_PCF_Stage"]   return count(distinct n.buildUrl) as Last24Hrs

match(n:CI:JENKINS:DATA)  where n.inSightsTime>(timestamp()/1000)-7*86400 AND n.jobName IN ["Build_Deploy_PCF_Dev", "Build_Deploy_PCF_QA", "API_Build_Deploy_PCF_QA" ,"Build_Deploy_PCF_Stage"] return count(distinct n.buildUrl) as Last7Days

match(n:CI:JENKINS:DATA)  where n.inSightsTime>(timestamp()/1000)-30*86400 AND n.jobName IN ["Build_Deploy_PCF_Dev", "Build_Deploy_PCF_QA", "API_Build_Deploy_PCF_QA" ,"Build_Deploy_PCF_Stage"] return count(distinct n.buildUrl) as Last30Days

match(m:CI:JENKINS:DATA) where exists(m.result)   and m.jobName IN ["CI_API_Pronto", "CI_API_PreSpec", "CI_API_RSpec"] AND (tofloat(m.inSightsTime)>=?START_TIME? AND tofloat(m.inSightsTime)<=?END_TIME?)
with m,
CASE WHEN m.result="SUCCESS"
THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as success,
CASE 
WHEN m.result="FAILURE" OR m.result="UNSTABLE" 
THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as failure
return split(m.inSightsTimeX,'T')[0] as inSightsTime,sum(success) as Success, sum(failure) as Failure  order by inSightsTime asc

match(m:CI:JENKINS:DATA) where exists(m.result)   and m.jobName IN  ["CI_API_Pronto", "CI_API_PreSpec", "CI_API_RSpec"]  AND (tofloat(m.inSightsTime)>=?START_TIME? AND tofloat(m.inSightsTime)<=?END_TIME?) 
with m,
CASE WHEN m.result="SUCCESS"
THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as success,
CASE 
WHEN m.result="FAILURE" OR m.result="UNSTABLE" 
THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as failure
return sum(success) as Success, sum(failure) as Failure

match(m:CI:JENKINS:DATA) where exists(m.result)   and m.jobName IN ["Build_Deploy_PCF_Dev", "API_Build_Deploy_PCF_QA", "Build_Deploy_PCF_QA", "Build_Deploy_PCF_Stage"] AND (tofloat(m.inSightsTime)>=?START_TIME? AND tofloat(m.inSightsTime)<=?END_TIME?)
with m,
CASE WHEN m.result="SUCCESS"
THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as success,
CASE 
WHEN m.result="FAILURE" OR m.result="UNSTABLE" 
THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as failure
return split(m.inSightsTimeX,'T')[0] as inSightsTime,sum(success) as Success, sum(failure) as Failure  order by inSightsTime asc

match(m:CI:JENKINS:DATA) where exists(m.result)   and m.jobName IN ["Build_Deploy_PCF_Dev", "API_Build_Deploy_PCF_QA", "Build_Deploy_PCF_QA", "Build_Deploy_PCF_Stage"] AND (tofloat(m.inSightsTime)>=?START_TIME? AND tofloat(m.inSightsTime)<=?END_TIME?) 
with m,
CASE WHEN m.result="SUCCESS"
THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as success,
CASE 
WHEN m.result="FAILURE" OR m.result="UNSTABLE" 
THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as failure
return sum(success) as Success, sum(failure) as Failure

match(n:CI:JENKINS:DATA)  where n.jobName IN ["Build_Deploy_PCF_Dev", "API_Build_Deploy_PCF_QA", "Build_Deploy_PCF_QA", "Build_Deploy_PCF_Stage"] with  n.jobName as jobName,n.result as result,n.buildNumber as buildNumber,avg(toInt(n.duration)/1000) as AvgDurationSecs,split(n.inSightsTimeX,"Z")[0] as BuildTime,collect(distinct n.buildUrl) as buildURL,toInt(n.inSightsTime) as time,n.shortDescription as Description return jobName,result,buildNumber,AvgDurationSecs,BuildTime,buildURL,Description,time order by time desc limit 5

match(m:CI:JENKINS:DATA) where exists(m.result) and  m.jobName="Build_Deploy_PCF_Dev" AND (tofloat(m.inSightsTime)>=?START_TIME? AND tofloat(m.inSightsTime)<=?END_TIME?) return count(distinct m.buildUrl) as Development

panels.title: No. of Deployments in DEV Environment

targets.target: match(m:CI:JENKINS:DATA) where exists(m.result) and   m.jobName IN ["Build_Deploy_PCF_QA", "API_Build_Deploy_PCF_QA"] AND (tofloat(m.inSightsTime)>=?START_TIME? AND tofloat(m.inSightsTime)<=?END_TIME?) return count(distinct m.buildUrl) as QA

panels.title: No. of Deployments in QA Environment

targets.target: match(m:CI:JENKINS:DATA) where exists(m.result) and  m.jobName IN ["Build_Deploy_PCF_Stage"] AND (tofloat(m.inSightsTime)>=?START_TIME? AND tofloat(m.inSightsTime)<=?END_TIME?) return count(distinct m.buildUrl) as Stage

panels.title: No. of Deployments in Stage Environment

insightsChartEditorModel.joinInstructions:
var join = google.visualization.data.join(dataTables[0], dataTables[1], 'full', [[0, 0]], [1], [1]);
return google.visualization.data.join(join , dataTables[2], 'full', [[0, 0]], [1,2], [1]);

targets.target: MATCH(n:CI:JENKINS:DATA) where n.jobName in ["Build_Deploy_PCF_Dev"] AND tofloat(n.inSightsTime)>=?START_TIME? AND tofloat(n.inSightsTime)<=?END_TIME?  return split(n.inSightsTimeX,'T')[0] as inSightsTime,count(distinct n.buildUrl) as Dev order by inSightsTime

MATCH(n:CI:JENKINS:DATA) where n.jobName in ["Build_Deploy_PCF_QA", "API_Build_Deploy_PCF_QA"] AND tofloat(n.inSightsTime)>=?START_TIME? AND tofloat(n.inSightsTime)<=?END_TIME?  return split(n.inSightsTimeX,'T')[0] as inSightsTime,count(distinct n.buildUrl) as QA order by inSightsTime

MATCH(n:CI:JENKINS:DATA) where n.jobName in ["Build_Deploy_PCF_Stage"] AND tofloat(n.inSightsTime)>=?START_TIME? AND tofloat(n.inSightsTime)<=?END_TIME?  return split(n.inSightsTimeX,'T')[0] as inSightsTime,count(distinct n.buildUrl) as Stage order by inSightsTime

panels.title: No. of API Deployment Environment Wise

targets.target:
match(n:CI:JENKINS:DATA {result:"SUCCESS"}) where n.jobName IN ["Post_Deploy_SanityCheck_Dev", "API_Post_Deploy_SanityCheck_QA", "Post_Deploy_SanityCheck_QA", "API_Post_Deploy_SanityCheck_Stage"] AND (tofloat(n.inSightsTime)>=?START_TIME? AND tofloat(n.inSightsTime)<=?END_TIME?)  with count(n.result) as success OPTIONAL match(m:CI:JENKINS:DATA) where exists(m.result) AND m.jobName IN [
"Post_Deploy_SanityCheck_Dev", "API_Post_Deploy_SanityCheck_QA", "Post_Deploy_SanityCheck_QA", "API_Post_Deploy_SanityCheck_Stage"] AND (tofloat(m.inSightsTime)>=?START_TIME? AND tofloat(m.inSightsTime)<=?END_TIME?)  return round(tofloat(success*100)/count(m)) as percent

match(m:CI:JENKINS:DATA) where m.jobName IN ["Post_Deploy_SanityCheck_Dev", "API_Post_Deploy_SanityCheck_QA", "Post_Deploy_SanityCheck_QA", "API_Post_Deploy_SanityCheck_Stage"] AND (tofloat(m.inSightsTime)>=?START_TIME? AND tofloat(m.inSightsTime)<=?END_TIME?)
with m,
CASE WHEN m.jobName="Post_Deploy_SanityCheck_Dev"
THEN m.duration ELSE 0 END as Post_Deploy_SanityCheck_Dev,
CASE 
WHEN m.jobName="API_Post_Deploy_SanityCheck_QA"
THEN m.duration ELSE 0 END as API_Post_Deploy_SanityCheck_QA,
CASE 
WHEN m.jobName="Post_Deploy_SanityCheck_QA"
THEN m.duration ELSE 0 END as Post_Deploy_SanityCheck_QA,
CASE 
WHEN m.jobName="API_Post_Deploy_SanityCheck_Stage"
THEN m.duration ELSE 0 END as API_Post_Deploy_SanityCheck_Stage
return split(m.inSightsTimeX,'T')[0] as inSightsTime,ceil(avg(toInt(Post_Deploy_SanityCheck_Dev/1000))) as Post_Deploy_SanityCheck_Dev,ceil(avg(toInt(API_Post_Deploy_SanityCheck_QA/1000))) as API_Post_Deploy_SanityCheck_QA,ceil(avg(toInt(Post_Deploy_SanityCheck_QA/1000))) as Post_Deploy_SanityCheck_QA,ceil(avg(toInt(API_Post_Deploy_SanityCheck_Stage/1000))) as API_Post_Deploy_SanityCheck_Stage order by inSightsTime
